scripts.dev: concurrently -n vscode,autocompletion-engine -c green,yellow 'npm run dev:js' 'npm run dev:rust'
scripts.fmt: prettier --write . --ignore-path .gitignore '!autocompletion-engine/__test__/**/*.css' '!autocompletion-engine/*.js' '!autocompletion-engine/*.ts' && nix fmt && (cd autocompletion-engine && cargo fmt)
